dl.dd: The current set of displayed items on the template.XULElem("toolbar"). This will be modified when the user customizes the toolbar. The value of this attribute should be a comma-separated list of item IDs from the template.XULElem("toolbarpalette") or, additionally, any of the following strings: "separator", "spring", "spacer".

p.span: this isn't necessary the *current* set, i.e. it might not be equal the value of the currentSet property which is computed from the actual DOM
